thread.title: Cantor Fitzgerald taps Shore Capital team for Edinburgh office launch
thread.title_full: Cantor Fitzgerald taps Shore Capital team for Edinburgh office launch

author: Financial News
title: Cantor Fitzgerald taps Shore Capital team for Edinburgh office launch
text:
Cantor Fitzgerald taps Shore Capital team for Edinburgh office launch By Tim Burke 12 October 2015 Cantor Fitzgerald Europe is to join the select group of investment banks with an office in Edinburgh after hiring four analysts and salespeople from Shore Capital and relocating one of its London-based analysts.
